thread.title: Jennifer Parslow
thread.title_full: Ruby Lane reviewed by Jennifer Parslow

author: Jennifer Parslow
title: Jennifer Parslow
text: I found a pair of button studs on Ruby Lane that I just loved but hesitated because of the price. I left the items in my cart and forgot about them until I received an email from Ruby Lane that there would be a sale in the near future. I jumped on it. Thanks, Ruby Lane
